content.text:
# Syntagma Metro Station Archaeological Collection

Syntagma station      Syntagma
|website       =
}}
The Syntagma Metro Station Archeological Collection is a museum in Athens, Greece.  It is located at the Syntagma station of the Athens metro and it features a variety of historical items unearthed during the process of building the metro.
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20090906125441/http://www.breathtakingathens.com/node/5000668 City of Athens, Metro]
*[http://odysseus.culture.gr/h/1/gh151.jsp?obj_id=3363 Ministry of Culture and Tourism] (Greek only)
